title: Film
description: JSON schema for a film data structure

$schema.description: path to the JSON Schema to use for the validation of the JSON file describing the film

owner.description: unique identifier of the the film data structure owner

private.description: this property is set to true if the film if only its owner can get information about it, false if every user can get information about it

watchDate.description: the date when the film was watched by the owner

rating.description: the rating the owner has given to the film

favorite.description: this property is set to true if the film is among the favourite ones of the owner, false otherwise
